bgmm: 4 models (diagonal and general, either component specific or global)
EMMIXmfa: 4 models (either component-wise or common, on the intrinsic and diagonal residual error covariance matrices)

mclust: performance, histograms and boxplots of bootstrapped estimates, density plots (univariate),  scatter plots with uncertainity regions and boundaries (bivariate), isodensity (bivariate , 2D projected PCA or selecting coordinates)
Rmixmod: density curves, scatter plots with uncertainty boundaries
bgmm: performance, scatter plots with uncertainty boundaries
HDclassif: projected factorial map, performance (Cattell's scree plot, BIC performance, slope heuristic)
